nodes.text: All non-military personnel taking assignments in Iraq should be implanted with GPS tracking devices.
Hopefully this would make potential hostages less attractive if the terrorists knew there was a strong likelihood of their being brought to justice.
Our goal is to reduce kidnappings
These devices need to have a pressure sensitive  panic mode  that would activate a signal similar to an EPIRB on marine vessels.
If terrorists know that they can be likely brought to justice they are discouraged from kidnapping people
